channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: See A ‘Christmas Planet,’ Aurora And The Moon: The Holiday Night Sky
item.description: North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the Northern Hemisphere).

item.title: ‘Manor Lords’ Update Arrives Just In Time For Christmas
item.description: A huge Manor Lords update arrives in the nick of time for players to enjoy the highly rated strategy game over the holidays.

item.title: Human Therapists Fade But AI Mental Health Advising Lasts Forever
